content.webTitle: Bridget Jones's big pants top movie poll

fields.headline: Bridget Jones's big pants top movie poll
fields.bodyText: Bridget Jones and her big pants have been voted the top movie moment by over 1,000 cinemagoers in an online survey. The poll, conducted by Yell.com, puts the scene featuring Ms Jones, wearing her special tummy-holding-in pants, being seduced by a rakish Hugh Grant above classic scenes from Breakfast at Tiffany's and Gladiator. It is the only movie from 2001 to feature in the top ten. The Top 10 Movie Moments are: 1.Bridget Jones's Diary (2001): The tummy-holding-in knickers 2. The Matrix (1999): Neo becomes "the One" 3. Braveheart (1995): William Wallace: "You'll never take our freedom" 4. Pretty Woman (1990): Julia Roberts in expensive clothes tells the shop assistants who were rude to her: "Big Mistake. Huge." 5. Gladiator (2000): Final fight scene between Maximus and Commodus 6. The Italian Job (1969): "You were only supposed to blow the bloody doors off!" 7. Breakfast at Tiffany's (1961): Audrey Hepburn outside Tiffany's in evening dress eating a croissant 8. Pulp Fiction (1994): John Travolta dances with Uma Thurman 9. American Beauty (1999): Jane and Ricky watch Ricky's plastic bag film 10. Saving Private Ryan (1998): The D-day landings
